title: When is riot going to promote champion diversity?
body:
It's holidays and I'm getting bored of aram. So I decided to play normals to see if it would be better. 3 games later, bored af. I'm considering taking my op filthy casual skills into ranked just to avoid this since normals is full of tryhards too.

Pretty much how my first 3 normals in a year went:
2/3 mirror yas 
3/3 yas
3/3 terrible yas on my team
3/3 rengar jg
1/3 teammate decided to break the meta 
...and that was the 1 game I won
